title: Why are we wasting taxpayer money by making substandard items to space why can government provide enough funding for ISRO?
selftext: It feels really bad even this mission also looks unpromising. I think ISRO should be provided with enough money and resources to create quality space missions. We shouldn’t be focusing on cost cutting by making incompetent machines which in turn is costing us more.
